backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining hotel, ticket, bundle, and user profile types with access control and profile retrieval logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build-related features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file providing short descriptions of major frontend components and pages.
frontend/.env.capacitor.example: Example environment file specifying Capacitor server URL configuration.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android project build outputs and IDE artifacts.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining SDK levels, dependencies, build types, and Capacitor integration.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest configuring app metadata, main activity, file provider, and required permissions.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main Capacitor activity extending BridgeActivity with default onCreate behavior.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Rounded adaptive icon definition using the same background and foreground assets.
Adaptive icon definition referencing launcher background and foreground assets.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Resource strings defining app name, activity title, and package identifiers.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build file setting repositories and Android/Google services classpaths.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, Jetifier, and JVM memory configuration.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings including app and Capacitor Android modules.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app IDs, web directory, server URL, and Android settings.
frontend/docs/android.md: Comprehensive Android installation guide covering PWA setup and debug APK builds.
frontend/docs/README.md: Documentation index describing available guides and quick links for Android installation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, shortcuts, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with basic styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, cache cleanup, and network‑first fetch logic with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, startup error handling, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definitions for backend types including users, groups, albums, hotels, tickets, and comparisons.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth, navigation, and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to set a screen name and save their profile via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to the sign‑in page and allowing public routes to bypass auth.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays a sign‑in screen with branding, login button, and error messaging for failed login attempts.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Renders a chat interface with scrolling message history, input box, and send handling with Enter shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, background images, and route‑based title updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows a footer with app branding, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Provides a responsive top navigation bar with dynamic items based on authentication and user profile.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Displays a grid of photos with tagging and deletion options, including a modal panel for tagging people.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles image uploads with progress tracking, validation, and mutation to add photos to an album.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Provides a dialog to add, remove, and save manual person tags for a photo using friend selection or principal ID input.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: Allows adding, editing, and deleting hotel listings with room and price details, updating the parent list.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation and modification of ticket options including type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/Transport: Lets users add and remove transport offers with mode, provider, class, and price information.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Enables creation and editing of VIP packages including price, inclusions, and perks.
frontend/src/components/profile/LegalNam: Displays and saves the user's private legal name with change tracking and backend persistence.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineStatu: Shows an online/offline status banner by listening to browser events and briefly displaying a 'back online' message.
frontend/src/components/pwa/StartupError: Captures global errors, unhandled rejections, and custom startup errors, displaying dismissible alert banners.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Displays a travel bundle’s pricing, ticket, hotel, and transport details with badges for ranking and VIP status.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Provides a dropdown to choose sorting options for travel bundles, such as price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gates purchase-related UI behind authentication and parental consent, prompting users to sign in or confirm permission.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized app branding including app name, tagline, and logo asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, including login state, identity loading, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, legal info, friends, comparisons, groups, albums, and messages using the actor and identity contexts.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode, and route background styling utilities.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as localized currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates ticket–hotel–VIP–transport bundles and finds cheapest transport options for trip comparisons.
frontend/src/lib/pwa/registerServiceWork: Registers a service worker in production and exposes success/error callbacks with periodic update checks.
frontend/src/lib/routeBackgrounds.ts: Maps routes to background images and resolves backgrounds with inheritance for nested routes.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Calculates check‑in and check‑out timestamps based on a concert date and before/after day offsets.
frontend/src/lib/upgradeDetection.ts: Detects upgrade alternatives across tickets, transport, and hotel rooms by comparing quality and price against a baseline bundle.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Album detail page allowing viewing, uploading photos, and deleting an album with navigation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Displays a group’s details, chat history, and messaging UI, and lets users post messages or leave the group. Handles loading, missing groups, and user identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Shows all groups for the signed‑in user and provides a dialog to create a new group. Handles loading states, authentication, and navigation to group detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing‑style landing page describing app features and linking users to key tools like the trip builder and saved comparisons. Includes hero content, feature cards, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/InstallAndroidPage.ts: Provides instructions for installing the app on Android via PWA or APK. Includes step‑by‑step guides, warnings, and feature descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Displays a user’s photo albums and offers a dialog to create new ones. Handles authentication, loading states, album creation, and navigation to album details.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile, legal name section, and saved trip comparisons with delete options, handling loading and unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates, sorts, and displays travel bundles from trip data, supports selecting a bundle, detecting upgrades, and saving comparisons.
Shows the user's saved travel comparisons with loading, empty, and unauthenticated states, and allows deleting individual comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects signed-in users to their profile and shows a sign‑in screen for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: Collects event, ticket, hotel, and transport details to build trip data and navigate to comparison results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color system, typography/container/animation plugins, and extended theme settings for layout, colors, fonts, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s Node-side files enabling composite builds, ESNext modules, and bundler-style resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup using React, environment handling, path aliases, a dev server with proxying, and validated Internet Identity URL injection.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, including the app’s purpose, architectural notes, known issues, and feature list for the EOATravelDeals app.
